Tohka Yatogami.quotes: ──My name is Yatogami Tohka. An important name given to me by a important person. ──Isn’t that nice?

Kurumi Tokisaki.quotes: You were ready to kill another creature, yet you're scared to be killed. Don't you think that's weird? When you point a gun at another life... This is what happens.

Himekawa Yoshino.quotes: I…… hate, painful things. I also hate…… scary things. Surely, those people too… don't want it either.

Kaguya Yamai.quotes: I don’t want to die… I want to live… I, I want to be with Yuzuru more.

Yuzuru Yamai.quotes: Reply—Yuzuru... too. I don’t want to disappear. I want to live with Kaguya.

Miku Izayoi.quotes: I──Lost it. Once. Because of those ugly males, I lost my voice due to a psychological disorder—the voice… the voice more important than my life…

Kyouno Natsumi.quotes: When you all gave me a massage... I was happy. When you cut my hair... I was happy. When you chose my clothes... I was happy!

Tobiichi Origami.quotes: I will leave my tears with you. I will give you my smile. Please take my happiness—all of it. This will be the last time I cry.

Mukuro Hoshimiya.quotes: Needless to vociferate, Nushi-sama shall trim it for Muku, ay? Barring family, none may lay a finger on this hair.

Kotori Itsuka.quotes: Doing something so stupid…! You should only listen to what I say! You have to properly calculate every recovery limit.

Nia Honjou.quotes: —Isn't it your job to make the Spirits fall for you, boy? No... It’s not that simple.

Mio Takamiya (Spirit of Origin).quotes: I am the origin of all Spirits—a force beyond any you’ve witnessed.
